sentences.en: A third patient a bacterial infection that started several months after deice implantation.
sentences.cn: 三分之一的患者在补片植入后的开始几周发生感染.

sentences.en: He has since left for home, with that experimental heart - assist deice that keeps his heart pumping.
sentences.cn: 安装之后, 他就带着那个维持他心脏搏动的实验性心脏辅助装置回家了.

sentences.en: Objectie . To explore the biomechanical impact of the Dynesys deice in io.
sentences.cn: 目标:探索体内Dynesys装置的生物力学影响.

sentences.en: The apoptosis signal is delivered a molecule called TRAIL that coats the cancer - killing deice.
sentences.cn: 凋亡信号通过涂覆在癌杀灭装置表面的TRAIL分子传递.

sentences.en: Using the ISPC deice was shown to improve cardiac output and visceral perfusion during pneumoperitoneum ( PP ) .
sentences.cn: 运用这项 ISPC 设备可显示在造气腹过程中心输出量增加以及内脏血流灌注得以改善.

sentences.en: We call such a deice a capacitor condenser, and its ability to store electrical energy capacitance.
sentences.cn: 这样的装置称之为电容器, 其储存电能的能力称为电容.
